TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TcpClientChannel extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSender, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ISecurableChannel
Public Class TcpClientChannel Implements IChannel, IChannelSender, ISecurableChannel
type TcpClientChannel = class interface IChannelSender interface IChannel interface ISecurableChannel

summary.span: 为远程调用实现使用 TCP 协议传输消息的客户端信道。

span.span: For remote calls, implements a client channel that uses the TCP protocol to transmit messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-class-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-class-note.md)] 信道在远程处理边界 （例如，计算机或应用程序域） 之间传输消息。Channels transport messages across remoting boundaries (for example, computers or application domains). 类将使用 TCP 协议的消息传输。The class transports messages using the TCP protocol. .NET Framework 远程处理基础结构使用的通道来传输远程调用。Channels are used by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls. 当客户端发出对远程对象的调用时，调用将被序列化为一条消息是由客户端通道发送和接收的服务器信道。When a client makes a call to a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel. 然后，它是反序列化和处理。It is then deserialized and processed. 任何返回的值是由服务器信道传输和接收客户端通道。Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel. 若要执行其他处理的消息在客户端，您可以指定的实现处理的所有消息通过接口传递。To perform additional processing of messages on the client side, you can specify an implementation of the interface through which all messages processed by the are passed. 默认情况下，类使用二进制格式化程序序列化的所有消息。By default, the class uses a binary formatter to serialize all messages. 一个对象具有关联的配置属性，可以在设置配置文件中运行时 (通过调用静态方法) 或以编程方式 (通过传递集合构造函数）。A object has associated configuration properties that can be set at run time either in a configuration file (by invoking the static method) or programmatically (by passing a collection to the constructor). 有关这些配置属性的列表，请参阅的文档。For a list of these configuration properties, see the documentation for . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类来调用远程类型。The following code example shows the use of the class to call a remote type. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpInfo#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CPP/client.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpInfo#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CS/client.cs#20)] 在上面的示例调用的远程类型定义，下面的代码。The remote type called in the example above is defined by the following code. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpInfo#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CPP/remotable.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpInfo#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CS/remotable.cs#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关通道配置属性的详细信息，请参阅[通道和格式化程序配置属性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100))。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100)). 如果不需要接收器功能，设置`sinkProvider`参数`null`。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数创建具有特定的配置属性的对象。The following code example shows the use of this constructor to create a object with specific configuration properties. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpAuth#31](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpAuth/CPP/client.cpp#31)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpAuth#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpAuth/CS/client.cs#31)]

exception.span: 配置属性的格式设置不正确。

span.span: A configuration property was incorrectly formatted.

related.span: 通道和格式化程序配置属性

span.span: Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数设置属性使用`name`参数。This constructor sets the property by using the `name` parameter. 如果你想要注册多个通道，每个通道必须具有唯一的名称。If you want to register more than one channel, each channel must have a unique name. 如果不需要接收器功能，设置`sinkProvider`参数`null`。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造。The following code example shows how to construct a . [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel#31](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel/CPP/client.cpp#31)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel/CS/client.cs#31)]

summary.span: 获取当前信道的优先级。

span.span: Gets the priority of the current channel.

value.span: 一个整数，表示分配给该信道的优先级。

span.span: An integer that represents the priority assigned to the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 优先级将控制在其中相互竞争的客户端连接到给定终结点; 的顺序更高优先级通道所连接之前较低优先级通道。The priority controls the order in which competing clients connect to a given endpoint; higher priority channels connect before lower priority channels. 默认优先级为 1;允许使用负的优先级。The default priority is 1; negative priorities are allowed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了使用此属性。The following code example shows the use of this property. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpInfo#22](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CPP/client.cpp#22)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpInfo#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CS/client.cs#22)]

param.name: objectURI
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含新信道消息接收器的 URI，该信道消息接收器将消息传送到指定 URL 或信道数据对象。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a URI of the new channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

param.span: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 返回将消息传送到指定 URL 或信道数据对象的信道消息接收器。

span.span: Returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

returns.span: 将消息传递给指定 URL 或信道数据对象的信道消息接收器。

span.span: A channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回将消息传送到指定的 URL 或信道数据对象的信道消息接收器。The method returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to either the specified URL or the channel data object. 如果`uri`参数是`null`，`remoteChannelData`用作接收器的目标。If the `uri` parameter is `null`, `remoteChannelData` is used as a target for the sink. 要么`url`或`remoteChannelData`参数可以是`null`，但不可同时使用两者。Either the `url` or `remoteChannelData` parameters can be `null`, but not both. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example shows the use this method. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel#32](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel/CPP/client.cpp#32)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel/CS/client.cs#32)]
